de.larssh.utils.time

Class Stopwatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.larssh.utils.time.Stopwatch
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloseableStopwatch

    public class Stopwatch
extends Object
    Implementation of a synchronized stopwatch starting at Instant.now(). sinceStart() can be used to retrieve the duration since the stopwatch started.

    checkpoint(String) adds a new checkpoint. It might be used for split or lap times. sinceLast() can be used to retrieve the duration since the last checkpoint was created.

    • Method Detail

      • checkpoint

        public Stopwatch.Checkpoint checkpoint(String name)
        Adds a new checkpoint referenced by name.

        name does not need to be unique. Multiple checkpoints with the same name might exist.

        Parameters:
        name - name to reference the checkpoint
        Returns:
        the new checkpoint

        Duration since the stopwatches start

      • waitFor

        public boolean waitFor(Duration duration,
                       Duration timeoutSinceStart)
                throws InterruptedException
        Waits for duration using Thread#sleep(long). If reached, it times out at timeoutSinceStart after the Stopwatch start.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration to wait
        timeoutSinceStart - timeout duration since the Stopwatch start
        Returns:
        true if the timeout was not reached and false if the timeout has been reached
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if any thread has interrupted the current thread

      • waitFor

        public boolean waitFor(Duration duration,
                       Duration timeoutSinceStart,
                       Consumer<Duration> wait)
        Waits for duration using wait. If reached, it times out at timeoutSinceStart after the Stopwatch start.

        Note: The Duration given to wait might be less than duration to handle timeoutSinceStart more precisely.

        Parameters:
        duration - duration to wait
        timeoutSinceStart - timeout duration since the Stopwatch start
        wait - method to use for waiting
        Returns:
        true if the timeout was not reached and false if the timeout has been reached

      • stream

        public Stream<Stopwatch.Checkpoint> stream()
        Sequential Stream with the checkpoints as its source
        Returns:
        a sequential Stream over the checkpoints

      • getStartInstant

        public Instant getStartInstant()
        Instant at the stopwatches start
        Returns:
        the instant at the stopwatches start time
